input_args.passage: "David Wells pitches first perfect game in Yankee Stadium ... | May 17, 1998: David Wells pitches first perfect game in Yankee Stadium since Don Larsen · 1 Tyler Kepner, “Baseball: Wells's Book has Teammates ..."
input_args.claim: 'Specifically, source indicates that on May 17, 1998, David Wells of the New York Yankees pitched the 15th perfect game in Major League Baseball history and the second in team history.'
